# Copilot Instructions

This project follows the Conventional Commits specification.
Commit messages should adhere to the following format:

<type>(<scope>): <description>

[optional body]

[optional footer(s)]

- **type:** Must be one of: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, build, ci, chore, revert.
- **scope (optional):** A short description of the scope of the change (e.g., parser, ui, auth).
- **description:** A concise, imperative, present tense description of the change.
- **body (optional):** A longer, more detailed explanation of the change.
- **footer(s) (optional):** References to issues or breaking changes (e.g., Closes #123, BREAKING CHANGE: ...).
